m_szDocSumamry: University of Michigan study weighs efficiencies of hydrogen and pure electric vehicles Matt LeBlanc joins Chris Evans as co-host for BBC 'Top Gear' revamp University of Michigan study weighs efficiencies of hydrogen and pure electric vehicles For the time being, it appears that battery-electric vehicles confer the greatest benefits, but hydrogen is hot on the trail. Andrew Krok Cars are Andrew's jam, as is strawberry. He started his auto-industry career working as a photographer and social media coordinator for Fluid MotorUnion, a prominent aftermarket parts fabrication garage for late-model
